name: Funny Heroes - Juragan Wayang
description:
Descrpetion

Funny Heroes – Juragan Wayang is a combination of strategy and spicy humor. Enter the arena and fight in epic battle. Defeat enemies to earn treasure, increase your strength, and dominate the PVP Mode!

Features

* Availale 7 different clan with +60 unique heroes and spell
* Upgrade your heroes to be a stronger
* Awesome and smooth animation character
* More than 25 awesome battle arena
* Check your global ranking in PVP mode
* Get daily bonuses : Chest, Coins, Gems
* and many more

Are you ready to fight and punch someone? 

No connection? No problem! You can play Funny Heroes – Juragan Wayang online or offline.
